game.name: 2nd EVE
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Reality broke when the ARGOS jumped into hyperspace. Sister Superior Zola must navigate corridors where her own crew has twisted into monsters, rogue machines hunt the living, and deadly anomalies tear through the ship. Humanity's last survivors lie frozen in cryosleep, depending on you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Reality broke when the ARGOS jumped into hyperspace. Sister Superior Zola must navigate corridors where her own crew has twisted into monsters, rogue machines hunt the living, and deadly anomalies tear through the ship. Humanity's last survivors lie frozen in cryosleep, depending on you.
